articles.title: Sheen beatification confirmed; date and place remain TBD - The Pillar
articles.description: Beatification of the popular American archbishop has been anticipated for several years
articles.content:
Peoria Bishop Louis Tylka announced Monday that the Vatican has approved the beatification of American Archbishop Fulton Sheen, setting the stage for a beatification Mass later this year.
